thread.title: Jason Waller

author: Jason Waller
title: Jason Waller
text: This company clearly has got it's act together, excellent website, followed up by prompt emails and phone call to book a time slot. The fitter phoned before he arrived, came exactly at the scheduled time and was very polite, informative and presentable. The tyres were fitted quickly and efficiently, overall amazing service and cheaper and more convenient than any other tyre fitting service. Why sit around in a grimy garage when you can kick back at home, perfect ðŸ™‚
